articles.title: Major spyware warning for all iPhone and Android users - Komando
articles.description: Security researchers have found evidence of government-sanctioned spyware being installed on iPhones and Android phones.
articles.content:
Hackers can implant malware in your computer, phone or tablet without you knowing. And the entry points vary from websites that spoof legitimate ones to an innocent-looking link in your email.
